name: MINE TOWN 0.1
description:
This is a mobile test ! 

The levels in this game are part of a bigger project, reason for this upload is to test functions and difficulty on mobile devices, You can check out the progress of the full game on my twitter page.

@scilized

Please leave feedback on what you think !

Are levels to hard ?

Are the controls on mobile fiddly or laggy ? 

Any glitches in gameplay or graphics ?

Any thing you would like to add - all feedback is always welcome 

Thank you
